subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: There were chants of “M.V.P.” Tuesday night at Madison Square Garden as Dirk Nowitzki’s campaign picked up steam, leading the Dallas Mavericks to a rout of the Knicks.
snippet: There were chants of “M.V.P.” Tuesday night at Madison Square Garden as Dirk Nowitzki’s campaign picked up steam, leading the Dallas Mavericks to a rout of the Knicks.
